product_name: The North Face Osito Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Incredibly soft, The North Face Osito Fleece Jacket for women wraps you in warmth and will soon become your must-wear for hiking, trekking to yoga class and lounging by the fire. Polyester fleece has a silken feel and a brushed collar lining. The North Face Osito Fleece Jacket for women has zippered hand pockets. Zip-in/snap-in compatible with other garments from The North Face (not included); cuff snaps stay concealed until you need them. Elastic-bound cuffs and hem cinch cord seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Incredibly soft, The North Face Osito Fleece Jacket for women wraps you in warmth and will soon become your must-wear for hiking, trekking to yoga class and lounging by the fire.
